  • from God's own country, Team Unwired is an ensemble of undergraduate engineering students at the National Institute of Technology Calicut (NITC). Team Unwired strives towards achieving its primary goal which is to use the knowledge and concepts gained in classes and employ them in engineering projects.

Baja SAE India

Baja SAE is a single seated all-terrain vehicle design and fabrication competition for students organized by SAE (Society of Automotive Engineers) India an affiliate to SAE International. Each team's goal is to design and build a prototype of a rugged single seat, off-road recreational four-wheel vehicle. The Baja SAE series consists of seven competitions held across the globe. Students must function as a team not only to design, build, test, promote, and run a vehicle within the limits of the rules, but also to manage their educational priorities and at the same time generate financial support for their project.

We participated in Baja SAE 2010 and 2012, both held in Pithampur near Indore in the NATRAX facility. Gasotech was our title sponsor in both attempts and we extend our heartfelt gratitude to Mr Prakash Shetty, our alumni and Managing Director of Gasotech India Ltd.

Unwind 1.0

Our decision to take part in Baja SAE 2010 required radical changes in the approach of the student community towards projects. The college provided us with a workspace and work began in the summer of 2009. Everything was new to the team members and so everything was built from scratch. The Gasotech Unwind 1.0 was special because a gearbox was built by the students, a CVT was incorporated in the transmission and the chassis was made of chromoly. This made the car stand out from the others and was one of the lightest cars in the event. It was also the 8th best in terms of design.

Gasotech Unwind 2.0

Our second foray into the Baja SAE event was in 2012. The team was able to get the car up and running three months in advance to the competition, allowing ample time to run tests and tune the vehicle. It comes as no surprise then that we were able to do so well. We were called the "Leopards of Kerala" by the other teams considering our hill climbing ability and quick acceleration.

Achievements:

  • 16th overall out of 250 teams
  • Dronacharya award - best faculty in charge award
  • 3rd in hill climb
  • 8th in acceleration test




OUR SPONSERS

SPONSOR US

Formula Student is a renowned global challenge taken up by auto enthusiasts from over 140 different universities, with the numbers only growing as each racing season progresses. TeamUnwired will be the only team and the very first team from Kerala and among the few from India to compete. A competition that is so vital for an upcoming engineer, giving focus to every aspect to further ones's career. It is important that the awareness of the competition is spread across the nation, encouraging a wider band of team numbers to enter Formula Student. By partnering with TeamUnwired a positive educational cause is fulfilled, allowing better prepared engineers having expertise in an array of areas ready for any changing work environment.

With over 140 teams from different universities participating in the world's largest student motorsport event annually, the media coverage is remarkable. Partnering with TeamUnwired ensures that the team will proudly represent its partners by displaying logos on the car and various other forms throughout the racing season.

Sponsorship is accepted as monetary, part, and technical assistance. If you are interested in sponsoring TeamUnwired please download our marketing brochure for more details or feel free to contact us at any time.
